main(String[]) - Static method in class commandline.Start
The entry point to the command line application, takes input from the command line, setting up the GameEnvironment entity and then passses off the GameEnvironment to Main.

makeMove(int, Monster) - Method in class game.monsters.DebuffMonster
Performs debuff attack if move is 1, else calls base Monster makeMove().
makeMove(int, Monster) - Method in class game.monsters.FlyingMonster
Makes fly move if move is 1, else calls base class method
makeMove(int, Monster) - Method in class game.monsters.Monster
Makes a move based on an int move, for the base Monster class there is only one move, 0, which is a basic attack.
makeMove(int, Monster) - Method in class game.monsters.PoisonMonster
If move is 1 makes poison attack, else makes base class move.
makeMove(int, Monster) - Method in class game.monsters.RiskyMonster
Performs one shot attack if move is 1, else calls base Monster makeMove().
makeRandomMove(Monster) - Method in class game.monsters.DebuffMonster
50% chance to make a debuff attack, else makes a basic attack.
makeRandomMove(Monster) - Method in class game.monsters.FlyingMonster
Randomly makes fly move or base class attack, with 50% chance
makeRandomMove(Monster) - Method in class game.monsters.Monster
Same as makeMove, but makes a random move instead of taking a move integer to determine the move.
makeRandomMove(Monster) - Method in class game.monsters.PoisonMonster
Randomly makes poison attack or base class move with 50% probability of each.
makeRandomMove(Monster) - Method in class game.monsters.RiskyMonster
50% chance to make a one shot attack, else makes a basic attack.
makeRandomMove(Monster) - Method in class game.Player
Randomly decides which move to make,
MEDIUM - Enum constant in enum class game.ItemBuilder.ItemSize
 
Monster - Class in game.monsters
Monster is the base class for any monster types, it is responsible for the monsters current status, including health, damage, level, xp, whether the monster is fainted or awake, and temporary status effects.
Monster(String, int) - Constructor for class game.monsters.Monster
Constructs the Monster, setting the name, level, and then the initial damage, maxHealth and price based on that level.
